get.description:
Get details about the synchronization status of all entities.

You can subscribe to this topic to recieve new statuses in realtime!

remote.description: Cloud time of the last value

wakeup.description: Time this entity will sync again

404.description: Bad Request. There may be no cloud with that id.

get.description:
The events lists holds Events that happend during the synchronization like errors or successes, communication errors, pause & resume details and more.

You can subscribe to this topic to recieve new events in realtime!

200.description: Successful Operation. Codes are taken from HTTP status codes, which means 2XX indicates success, 4XX indicates client (Gateway) errors and 5XX means remote (Cloud) errors. Additional, 0XX indicates network errors. The message text is always a heading and some description text.

404.description: Bad Request. There may be no cloud with that id.

get.description:
Get container files through the container proxy.

All containers should host a http server that is listening on `WAZIGATE_ADDR` which is a environment variable given to the container. Wazigate-compatible containers are requred to expose a `package.json` file on http root level.

404.description: There is no container with that name or the container returned a 404 error.
